title: Digital Transformation
description: Led a complete digital overhaul for a national retail chain.
content: Led a complete digital overhaul for a national retail chain, including e-commerce platform, loyalty program, and in-store digital experience. Resulted in 43% increase in online sales.

title: Financial App Redesign
description: Redesigned user experience for a financial services application.
content: Redesigned user experience for a financial services application, simplifying complex workflows and improving user satisfaction scores by 28%.

title: Tech Startup Brand Identity
description: Developed comprehensive brand identity for an emerging tech startup.
content: Developed comprehensive brand identity and digital strategy for an emerging tech startup, helping secure Series A funding and establishing market presence.
